About Me

Currently, ECE undergrad at MNIT Jaipur

Basic Info

Hey, there folks! I'm Akash Chaudhary, currently pursuing B.Tech in Electronics and Comm. at MNIT Jaipur. I've been an avid learner of modern web development technologies like React, Node and Django since a long time now. Recently i found my keen interest in the area of native Android App Development also, so i am exploring Google's Flutter SDK. And i have developed many projects in respective fields, Indeed, the practical world is more intriguing than the theoretical one. If given an oppurtunity, i'll give the best result possible.
